verses.verse: And the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me came <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and waked <S%H5782><s%> me, as a man <S%H376><s%> that is wakened <S%H5782><s%> out of his sleep. <S%H8142><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> to me, What <S%H4100><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> you? And I said, <S%H559><s%> I have looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2005><s%> a candlestick <S%H4501><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> with a bowl <S%H1543><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of it, and his seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> pipes <S%H4166><s%> to the seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps, <S%H5216><s%> which are on the top <S%H7218><s%> thereof:
And two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> trees by it, one <S%H259><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the bowl, <S%H1543><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the left <S%H8040><s%> side thereof.
So I answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> are these, <S%H428><s%> my lord? <S%H113><s%>

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, Know <S%H3045><s%> you not what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> be? And I said, <S%H559><s%> No, <S%H3808><s%> my lord. <S%H113><s%>

Then he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Not by might, <S%H2428><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> by power, <S%H3581><s%> but by my spirit, <S%H7307><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> are you, O great <S%H1419><s%> mountain? <S%H2022><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> you shall become a plain: <S%H4334><s%> and he shall bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the headstone <S%H68><s%> <S%H7222><s%> thereof with shoutings, <S%H8663><s%> crying, Grace, <S%H2580><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> to it.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

The hands <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> have laid the foundation <S%H3248><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> shall also finish <S%H1214><s%> it; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you.

For who <S%H4310><s%> has despised <S%H937><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of small <S%H6996><s%> things? for they shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> and shall see <S%H7200><s%> the plummet <S%H68><s%> <S%H913><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> with those <S%H428><s%> seven; <S%H7651><s%> they are the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which run <S%H7751><s%> to and fro <S%H7751><s%> through the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> I, and said <S%H559><s%> to him, What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> trees on the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> and on the left <S%H8040><s%> side thereof?

And I answered <S%H6030><s%> again, <S%H8145><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, What <S%H4100><s%> be these two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> branches <S%H7641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> pipes <S%H6804><s%> empty <S%H7324><s%> the golden oil out of themselves?
And he answered <S%H559><s%> me and said, <S%H559><s%> Know <S%H3045><s%> you not what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> be? And I said, <S%H559><s%> No, <S%H3808><s%> my lord. <S%H113><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he, These <S%H428><s%> are the two <S%H8147><s%> anointed <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3323><s%> ones, that stand <S%H5975><s%> by the LORD <S%H113><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
